pages.text: Gadgets can interact with Fluids! Make sure $(l:buildinggadgets2:mech_raytrace_fluids)Raytracing Fluids$(/l) is enabled to select a fluid with shift-rightclick. $(br2)To place fluids in the world, you'll need a bucket with the appropriate fluid in it. $(br2)Alternatively, mods that add tanks (like Mekanism) can be used, and the fluids will be removed/inserted into tanks.

pages.title: Fluid Handling
pages.text: Switch the images above to see the different options

The copy paste gadget, can of course, handle fluids as well!$(br2)When undoing or exchanging fluids, the gadget will try to find a place to put the fluid (Like an empty bucket or tank) but will void the fluid if one is not found.
